content.raw:
As of commit 433a30a, there are 3 levels of granularity when choosing to show collisions:

* For the whole model, from the top menu

* All collisions in a link, from the link inspector (eye icon at the bottom with "COL" written)

* Each individual collision, from the collision tab of the link inspector (eye icon)

Setting a higher level one should affect all children, and buttons checked state should be updated. Let me know if you find any inconsistencies or if the usage is not clear.

![showcols.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/197817976-showcols.png)
content.html:
As of commit 433a30a, there are 3 levels of granularity when choosing to show collisions:

  • For the whole model, from the top menu

  • All collisions in a link, from the link inspector (eye icon at the bottom with "COL" written)

  • Each individual collision, from the collision tab of the link inspector (eye icon)

Setting a higher level one should affect all children, and buttons checked state should be updated. Let me know if you find any inconsistencies or if the usage is not clear.
